---
title: "lfsrhist"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
setwd("~/gtex-viz/data/ET_model_stronggenesnps/")
lfsr = read.table("lfsr.et_withbma.txt")
```

Now plot a histogram of the number of tissues with lfsr$\leq$thresh.

```{r}
lfindex=apply(lfsr,1,function(x){sum(x<=0.10)})
hist(lfindex,main="LFSR<=0.10,ETModel",freq=FALSE,nclass=40)
```
